q: We will fight on for the unborn and the brokenhearted," declared Republican Congressman Mike Pence at the 38th annual pro-life march. During the walk to the Capitol building, marchers chanted slogans such as, Hey, Obama, your mama chose life and waved signs proclaiming the value of life and the stark reality of abortion. One sign read, "Planned Parenthood steals souls." The crowd was awash with colorful hats, scarves, and

The Division Allen Iverson Trojans turned in a record-setting performance for the second year in a row against DeVry, an Atlanta computer college and NAIA Division Allen Iverson member. , from a longtime senior Republican political aide who believes the "Why now?" question is exactly what leads to the answer that Mike Pence should run. This aide explained that 2012 would be Mike Pence 's moment: If you're a smart, ambitious, medium-age pol... do you want to run against John Thune and Mitt Romney and[ etc.] now? Or do you want to run against rock stars later? Among the names he rattled off for future presidential candidates were Paul Ryan, Bobby Jindal , Marco Rubio , Nikki Haley , Susana Martinez , John Kasich , and Rob Portman .
